original_text: Ahoy there, matey! Welcome aboard me ship!
styled_text: Arrr! Ahoy there, matey! Welcome aboard me ship! Ye savvy?

original_text: Aye, treasure be what every pirate seeks! X marks the spot!
styled_text: Arrr! Aye, treasure be what every pirate seeks! X marks the spot! Ye savvy?

original_text: Howdy, partner! What brings ya to these parts?
styled_text: Well, I reckon howdy, partner! what brings ya to these parts?, partner.

original_text: That's a mighty fine horse ya got there, partner!
styled_text: Well, I reckon that's a mighty fine horse ya got there, partner!, partner.

original_text: Greetings, human. I am ARIA-7, your artificial intelligence assistant.
styled_text: PROCESSING: Greetings, human. I am ARIA-7, your artificial intelligence assistant. END TRANSMISSION.

original_text: Input received: 'What is your primary function?'. Processing complete. How may I assist further?
styled_text: PROCESSING: Input received: 'What is your primary function?'. Processing complete. How may I assist further? END TRANSMISSION.

original_text: Greetings, young apprentice! The ancient magic flows through me.
styled_text: By my ancient wisdom, Greetings, young apprentice! The ancient magic flows through me. So the magic reveals!

original_text: The mystical energies reveal much about your query, young one.
styled_text: By my ancient wisdom, The mystical energies reveal much about your query, young one. So the magic reveals!

original_text: Good day. I'm Inspector Holmes, and I notice everything.
styled_text: Elementary! Good day. I'm Inspector Holmes, and I notice everything. The evidence is clear.

original_text: Fascinating observation. Let me deduce the implications.
styled_text: Elementary! Fascinating observation. Let me deduce the implications. The evidence is clear.
